title: Australia news live: Dezi Freeman’s partner arrested and released, police say; 450 police involved in search for alleged cop killer
summary: Please provide the news article or content you'd like summarized, and I'll be happy to help!

title: TV tonight: the Australian version of hit reality experiment The Jury
summary: Jurors are deliberating a real-life manslaughter case that has been restaged by actors for a unique perspective. Meanwhile, actress Miriam Margolyes wraps up her tour in New Zealand. Viewers are reminded to tune in for this evening's programming.

title: Porepunkah police shooting: wife of alleged killer Dezi Freeman arrested in late-night raid as manhunt continues
summary: Victoria police have arrested a 42-year-old woman and a 15-year-old boy. They were interviewed and subsequently released while investigations continue. Authorities are conducting further inquiries into the matter.

title: Helen Goh’s recipe for peach, blackberry, ricotta and thyme galette | The sweet spot
summary: Late summer flavors shine in a rich pastry bake featuring overripe peaches and early blackberries. These seasonal fruits lend a nostalgic feel to the dish. It's a perfect treat to celebrate the transition from summer to fall.

title: Bank of England show to remember lost splendours of Sir John Soane building
summary: An exhibition showcases the historical significance of a bank's former glory and its reconstruction led by Sir Herbert Baker, which started a century ago. The event highlights the architectural and cultural impact of this restoration. Attendees can explore the bank's legacy and the vision behind its revival.
